content: errata explanations of m1l and m1r not included in abbreviations and techniques section a fantastic information page on increases can be found here 1 these lacy socks were designed to be made from a single 50-gram skein of koigu kpppm i wanted the yarn s stunning colours to still be displayed without being overshadowed by a stitch pattern or vice versa and so these lovely little socks came about they feature toe-up construction a short-row heel and a very simple lace pattern to flaunt your yarn s gorgeous colour copyright liz pankratz 2011 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only you may not sell copies of this pattern or of the project made from it without express permission of liz pankratz 1 http //www knittinghelp com/videos/increases
